name: round-a-bout
description:
A causal puzzle,  chained carriage deliver package while travel in a loop.

Control
Rotate anti-clockwiseRotate clockwiseMouse (recommanded)
Click on left half of the game screen
Click on right half of the game screen
Keyboardleft arrow key
right arrow key**

**  Due to a bug, right arrow key only works when the cursor is on the left half of game screen.

Credit

SFX: https://soundeffect-lab.info/
BGM: https://otologic.jp/
Font: https://grafxkid.itch.io/at01
